author: kfogel
msg: Start mirroring the entire revision history, not just the head tree.
This is so later when we copy whole trees for branches and tags, we'll
be able to pick out the items in the source that don't belong in the
Note that although the tests still pass after this, there is a bug in
deletion handling, which will be revealed by an upcoming addition to
All of this is in branches/cvs2svn-kfogel/:
(Dump.__init__): Use above new class to init repos_mirror instead of
prune-with-care.  We'll have two separate pruning tests soon.

author: kfogel
msg: Branch (again) so putting cvs2svn in a broken state won't hurt anyone.

author: striker
msg: New Apache module to allow path based access control to the repository.
Moved from subversion/mod_dav_svn/mod_dav_svn.h, so that mod_authz_svn and
possibly other modules can use it.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix the naive, brute-force relavent copy hunt algorithm so that it
works in light of the lack of sorting in the copies table.
(key_test): Was next_key().  Now tests svn_fs__prev_key(), too.
(find_relevant_copies): Rework this incorporate what was in
copies_cb_func(), and to use the new svn_fs__prev_key() so we can
guarantee that we are traversing the copies table in the right
calls to find_relevant_copies(), since that route didn't pan out
too well.  Leave TODOs for what needs to happen here.

author: xsteve
msg: - Use it in svn-status-property-edit to fix a coding system problem on win32
